title: Zoom! To the Moon!
content:
Beep beep boop!  Zoom zoomed Zip zoomed to the moon in his rocket ship.  Zip was a little robot with big round eyes and a tiny antenna.

Zoom's rocket was shiny red and very fast.  It whooshed through the stars, past twinkling lights.  Zip waved at a friendly shooting star!

On the moon, Zip bounced!  He bounced and bounced and bounced! The moon was made of cheese, or so it seemed!  It was so much fun!

Then, it was time to go home. Zoom's rocket zipped back to Earth.  Zip waved goodbye to the moon and his cheesy adventure.
